actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources; Senate Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 104-468.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from transferring any national forest system lands in the Angeles National Forest in California out of Federal ownership for use as a solid waste landfill.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from transferring any Angeles National Forest lands in California out of Federal ownership for use as a solid waste landfill.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from transferring any national forest system lands in the Angeles National Forest in California out of Federal ownership for use as a solid waste landfill.
